PROPOSAL_ID_TARGET.description: Target for the system-generated unique identifier.

HASH_SOURCE.description: Source hash provided by the proposal originator.

SYSTEM_CALCULATED_HASH.description: Internal field where the service writes the calculated hash of the payload for comparison.

LOG_REF_TARGET.description: Target for the Immutable Audit Log entry reference.

ANCHOR_REF_TARGET.description: Target field for final anchoring reference (temporarily set to PENDING).

purpose: Defines and controls secure access to proposal document paths for PIVS operations.
